scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-drop && npm run db-create
scripts.db-recreate-test: npm run db-drop-test && npm run db-create-test
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-recreate-manually && npm run db-migrate && npm run db-seed
scripts.db-reset-test: npm run db-recreate-manually-test && npm run db-migrate-test && npm run db-seed-test
scripts.test: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test-watch: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --watchAll
scripts.test-app: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest tests/app --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test-app-watch: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest tests/app --watchAll --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test-api: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest tests/api --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
scripts.test-api-watch: npm run db-reset-test && NODE_ENV=test npx jest tests/api --watchAll --verbose --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit
